item.description:
It's Thanksgiving! Let's go to the movies!

George Clooney plays the lead in The Descendants, and this will be our chance to see him in a small-release movie where his acting skills will be put to the test.

Alexander Payne is the director for The Descendants. He also directed About Schmidt (Jack Nicholson) and Sideways (Paul Giamatti). I enjoyed both, and I am really looking forward to this latest movie from Payne.

You can find out more about The Descendants at the theater website: http://www.landmarktheaters.com. If you click on the link for "Boston" on the left, then scroll down on the right to find the movie, you will also find a link for the movie's official website and a link for Ty Burr's review in the Boston Globe.

I will purchase my ticket at about 4:15 p.m., then wait at the foot of the stairs in the theater lobby. Look for me and my bright red backpack. At about 4:30, I will move into the theater auditorium (can't miss the previews!). You can find me there if you are late. The movie starts at 4:45 p.m.

After the movie, I will wait in the theater lobby to gather everyone.

Please RSVP if you plan to attend this event so I know who to look for.

Thanks!

Marianne
item.name: The Descendants (the movie)
